title: Your main is now a bussinessman/woman...
body:
What products does he/she sell? How does he/she handle employees? 

Ahri runs a highly successful brothel. Employees that earn the satisfaction of clients get to stroke her tails 9 times during the end of the day.

replies.body: My Business is dead people, without dead people my business would be dead,.. People...
It wouldn't matter what product Ahri was selling, she would make her fortune off of sexual harassment lawsuits alone.
LOL

"Do you want to be as swift as a coursing river?"
"Have all the force of a great typhoon?"
"And want the strength of a raging fire?"

Well let me introduce to you the latest hardcore workout craze _**XINSANITY**_

{{champion:5}} "Hi, my name is Xin Zhao and I created this hard core training method from my years as a gladiator and fighting the MUTHA F**KING HUN"

You will train your body to be able to do physics defying feats such as:

* Charging instantly at a target several of feet away
* Pushing everything not completely ingrained into the ground away EXCEPT the one guy you want to beat the s**t out of at that instant
* Even hitting your target so often that it becomes therapeutic and starts HEALING you!

You can get all this AND more for the low low price of 1350 IP or 585 RP!  ORDER NOW!

{{champion:114}} "I used to do nothing but hurt people when I danced masterfully with my blade, but thanks to **_XINSANITY_** I simply need to decisively hit my opponent from different angles and then me and everyone around me gets healed! Amazing!"

{{champion:92}} Even Riven isn't sure what she's selling anymore, it's all broken.  Her entire store gets vandalized and people hate her so much they buy tomatoes from a neighboring store just to throw at her.
{{champion:201}} owns a gym that everyone wants to go to
He bought it from Mundo when he quit bodybuilding to be a CEO.

{{champion:12}} 

He owns and operates a high class China shop with an attached vegetarian cafe. He is very defensive of his employees and kicks out anyone that is rude to them on the spot.

{{champion:268}} runs a restaurant. 
THE ORDER IS GIVEN
For {{champion:75}}, you mispelled farmer
{{champion:86}} CEO of BeyBlade Manufacturing
{{champion:55}} I'll take 5! :D

Rivaling Brands?
{{champion:63}}

> Everything is legal, of course.

Of course.

{{champion:57}} 
Runs a non-profit environmental group.

{{champion:89}} 
Runs a tanning salon or w/e it's called. It's actually just a normal building without a roof. All employees are required to be able to change the weather.
{{champion:40}} must be employee of the month

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Darkstar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=IzPEd7Xs,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-08-08T20:08:01.057+0000)
>
> {{champion:89}} 
> Runs a tanning salon or w/e it's called. It's actually just a normal building without a roof. All employees are required to be able to change the weather.

Also is constantly trying to get Diana to work there
too bad its a **tanning** salon {{item:3070}} {{champion:127}}{{item:3070}}

{{champion:122}} is in the business of dunking... and business is good.

{{champion:44}} runs a very successful gay bar, with many daily customers and an increasing profit.
and {{champion:254}} can run the lesbian bar while she is married to {{champion:51}}  who is a sherif

Sion owns a demolition business. He started out doing solo jobs, but soon found it necessary to hire associates. His operations are usually successful, but he sometimes forgets to escort the people out of the building.
{{champion:90}} sells crabs. If his employees have a problem, they'll have to write it down.
{{champion:41}} Gp sells oranges and everything is 'K

{{champion:56}}  sketchy lighting company, every now and then they make you pay to get your lights reinstalled because everything keeps getting dark for no reason. also only their lights make the dark go away. for no reason. it has nothing to do with nocturne.

{{champion:254}}  Sells big gloves. Grasps concepts quickly, her Handicraft is unparalleled.
I'll see myself out.
{{champion:245}} He's a specialized watch salesman and everytime some one leaves the store without buying something he rewinds time to try to coax them into buying something over and over again

{{champion:222}}  sells explosives! but since business is slow, she gets bored and often sets them off herself, destroying her workplace and those surrounding it. She doesnt realize thats the reason she doesnt get a lot of business.

{{champion:36}} he sells phones. if you don't like them he will chase you down and throw them at you until you give up and give him your money.

that guy is such aggressive salesman

he has no employees he doesn't need them

mr. world
{{champion:17}}  is a mycologist and mushroom salesman. He makes mushrooms that taste better than the average mushroom.

{{champion:131}} "Buy my moon pies....OR YOU ALL DIE AHAHAHAHAHAHA"

{{champion:102}} "Hello, would you be interested in possibly selling your soul to my pet spirit wolf? {{item:3930}} "

{{champion:254}} *punches customer* "WHAT DO YOU MEAN THESE BOXING GLOVES AREN'T A GOOD DEAL?!"

(I would list more but it's too late and my brain is tired)
{{champion:131}} At 30 years old, she still works at Starbucks while struggling to get her band to go viral.  "They... will not listen..."

{{champion:33}} Sells really powerful armor under the "Armordillo" brand, with the slogan "You'll be Okay!".

He usually avoids his employees though, especially in their workplaces. Rammus's appearance can be quite...distracting (to be honest, I'm not sure what else they expected).
{{champion:45}} : I sell death.

{{champion:223}}: Loan Shark.

And his business partner.

{{champion:429}}: Debt Collector.

You meant "Loan Shark", right?

I mean, {{champion:421}}  is more of a lone shark.
{{champion:91}} runs a sword and blade store called Stabby Stab. Employees have to wear capes and they must have hidden blades.
Actually, Talon works at Ubisoft nowadays.

{{champion:40}} Charges a 2.95 a minute relationship consulting fee over the phone. Longest call was a 3 hour session. Suffice it to say every man who calls her has no issue satisfying his girlfriend again.

Shes just that good.

{{champion:8}} is an evil monster who sucks the life out of people. He must be a lawyer or politician.

(jk)

He's probably is a nurse for the Red Cross for blood donations, or perhaps a surgeon, or maybe even a hematologist.

{{champion:43}} She runs a small but successful yoga studio, and also sells organic tea. One of the fellow yoga instructors is {{champion:16}}.

{{champion:134}} She's the mastermind behind a large, very successful company. Think Wal-Mart. She's never actually served a customer- she just rolls in the money that the company makes her, all the while working towards converting all her customers into mindless minions via subliminal messages.
{{champion:150}}  GNAR! NYAGLE!

{{champion:111}} runs a diving company that looks for long lost items/trains others to be divers. As a side note, he enjoys going to watch films. Though the people who watch the films with him do not.

Cho would be a hardcore salesman.

{{champion:31}} "I see you did not like my buisness proposal"

Casts Feast.

{{champion:31}} "Perhaps the next person I talk to will have more sense"
